item.description:
Come and play in JP!

Bring your favorite games to Jamaica Plain, and play your heart out in our Great Room.

Friday, January 16. Starts at 7:30 and we can go to 10-11. You are welcome to bring a snack to share.

Last time I hosted it was specifically for 3M bookshelf games. I won't limit you this time around, but I will have some of my collection on hand.

Location is one block from the Green St T stop on the Orange line, and there is plenty of street parking. Directions will be sent to "Yes" RSVPs prior to the event.
item.name: Come and play in JP!
